subject: Super Bowl
lead_paragraph: Colts defensive end Dwight Freeney said he was doing everything he could to heal his right ankle, which he hurt in the A.F.C. championship game on Jan. 24.
snippet: Colts defensive end Dwight Freeney said he was doing everything he could to heal his right ankle, which he hurt in the A.F.C. championship game on Jan. 24.
